actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to provide rescue diver training under the Coast Guard helicopter rescue swimming training program.

summary.text: Rescue Diver Training Act of 1996 - Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to provide rescue diver training to selected Coast Guard personnel under the helicopter rescue swimming program of the Coast Guard Authorization Act of 1984.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to provide rescue diver training under the Coast Guard helicopter rescue swimming training program.
